moves.name: Play Rough
moves.description: The user plays rough with the target and attacks it. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.

moves.name: Iron Head
moves.description: The user slams the target with its steel-hard head. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Taunt
moves.description: The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.

moves.name: Growl
moves.description: The user growls in an endearing way, making the opposing team less wary. The foes' Attack stats are lowered.

moves.name: Fairy Wind
moves.description: The user stirs up a fairy wind and strikes the target with it.

moves.name: Astonish
moves.description: The user attacks the target while shouting in a startling fashion. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Fake Tears
moves.description: The user feigns crying to fluster the target, harshly lowering its Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Bite
moves.description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. It may make the target flinch.

moves.name: Sweet Scent
moves.description: A sweet scent that lowers the opposing team's evasiveness. It also lures wild Pokémon if used in grass, etc.

moves.name: Vice Grip
moves.description: The target is gripped and squeezed from both sides to inflict damage.

moves.name: Feint Attack
moves.description: The user approaches the target disarmingly, then throws a sucker punch. It hits without fail.

moves.name: Baton Pass
moves.description: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting, passing along any stat changes.

moves.name: Crunch
moves.description: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. It may also lower the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Iron Defense
moves.description: The user hardens its body's surface like iron, sharply raising its Defense stat.

moves.name: Sucker Punch
moves.description: This move enables the user to attack first. It fails if the target is not readying an attack, however.

moves.name: Stockpile
moves.description: The user charges up power and raises both its Defense and Sp. Def. The move can be used three times.

moves.name: Swallow
moves.description: The power stored using the move Stockpile is absorbed by the user to heal its HP. Storing more power heals more HP.

moves.name: Spit Up
moves.description: The power stored using the move Stockpile is released at once in an attack. The more power is stored, the greater the damage.

moves.name: Iron Head
moves.description: The user slams the target with its steel-hard head. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Play Rough
moves.description: The user plays rough with the target and attacks it. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.
